My girlfriend and I had two private lessons with Lucky. He effectively managed to adapt the lessons to suit our differing levels of experience so that we both improved. Lucky went above and beyond expected by extending our lessons and enlisting additional help so that our lessons was more effective. We would highly recommend Lucky, he clearly knows how to teach surfing much better and more safely than others on the beach.

We took 3 surf lessons with Lucky. We were experienced beginners, but Lucky really helped us correct our pop-up, read the waves, and learn important safety rules in the ocean and with the board. Although we already had some experience, he helped us feel much more stable on the board. We managed to catch our own waves independently.
He was super friendly and professional and hands down the best teacher weâ€™ve had so far. We can definitely recommend him and would absolutely come back if we had the chance. 5/5
